Message.Title: IBM CEO can Acquire RIMM from Chairwomen of the board of RIMM, IBM will regret this golden chance if does not happen
Message.Msg: Go Big Blue. Dell may beat IBM to RIMM. AAPL soon will move to IBM Business, and start eat Big Blue lunch.

Message.Title: Obama: Another Bad Jobs Report.
Message.Msg: During the 4 day run of the democratic national convention, we added another $12 billion to the national debt. This is INSANITY! 4 more years of THIS... it'll bankrupt us!

Have seen nothing about Budweiser ... yet. But as for American contract jobs, please highlight some of the success stories: AstraZeneca, Texas, Amgen, Hilton Hotel (as American as you can get), Service Master. Please touch upon Roadmap 2015 and the shifting of the American labor force to India.
Look, why don't you just sit down, relax and have a nice steaming hot cup of #$%$

That's right already, but he is full of #$%$ so he may not be able to absorb any more.His intestines are already packed. I'm afraid if IBM hires one more Indian employee he will hit the fan. Awfully a one trick pony. With the Big Blue blues as he watches the stock drift northward.

Hey Yield, Also found out the if you use recognized initials for sayings, YAHOO! automatically converts them to pound signs, dollar signs and percents. I was trying to say #$%$ I wonder if you space them like that they come through? Here goes.
Nope I guess not. We're gonna have to play nice now... :)

Message.Title: Why ALL THE LOONIES HERE????
Message.Msg: This Board has more Loonies than the world has Cockroaches!!!!!!!!!!!!
